p: In the present study, IBM SPSS version 25 was used to analyze the collected data. In this study, descriptive statistics (frequency, percentages, mean, and standard deviation) and chi-square test were used. Descriptive statistics were used for the purpose of assessing the mental health status of participants. Chi square test was used to assess the interaction between socio-demographic factors (i.e. gender, provinces where study participants currently living, participantsâ€™ age, etc.) and mental health status and drinking behavior (i.e. anxiety, depression, alcohol consumptions, mental well-being, etc.).
